alert.note: Alert for Candler; Jenkins (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 30 at 7:15PM EDT until July 30 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF SCREVEN...BULLOCH...JENKINS AND CANDLER COUNTIES... At 715 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Woodcliff to Portal, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Statesboro, Sylvania, Brooklet, Portal, Rocky Ford, Altman, Dover, Scarboro, Woodcliff, Georgia Southern, Hopeulikit, Captolo, and Hunters. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
